post:
<a href="http://raxweb.com">**RaxWeb**</a> is a service provider located way down in the tiny land called New Zealand but offer services all across the globe! Our VPS servers utilize state of the art hardware and network and are always monitored with a close eye to ensure high quality is always brought directly to you!

The new servers are here and we've decided to do yet another special promotion to introduce our new, New Jersey location!

For LET we have a wide range of offers having a total of 3 plans to choose from with yearly options available on all!

**DOUBLE BANDWIDTH OFFER! OPEN A SUPPORT TICKET AFTER ORDERING TO RECEIVE YOUR FREE UPGRADE!**
